title: Sweet potato wedges
description: Sweet potato wedges make a great alternative to potato and count as one of your 5-a-day.These wedges provide 229 kcal, 2g protein, 30g carbohydrate (of which 8g sugars), 11g fat (of which 2g saturates), 5g fibre and 0.2g salt per portion.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
